case.name: Megumin Terrorism
case.description: Megumin talks about that time she terrorized an encampment of monsters for days.

case.name: Megumin No Bra
case.description: Megumin reveals she isn't wearing a bra.

case.name: Megumin asks about shaving
case.description: Megumin is confused after seeing a woman with a shaved groin and asks what that is about.
